atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities`, and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to move the enclosed custom styles to the appropriate Tailwind bucker, layers include `base`, `component`, and `utilities`

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the @apply directive to inline Tailwind utility classes to a custom CSS class
